scripts.gen:pkg: npm run gen:types2 && npm run git:init && npm run pkg:only
scripts.gen:types2: rm -r ./src/neurelo-sdk || openapi-generator generate -g typescript-axios --package-name neurelo -t ./openapi-template -i './neurelo/neurelo-ts-sdk-c295d4c24369-openapi.json' -o './src/neurelo-sdk' --global-property apis,models,modelDocs=false,modelTests=false,apiTests=false,supportingFiles --additional-properties supportsES6=true && cp ./openapi-template/README.md ./src/neurelo-sdk/
scripts.git:init: cd ./src/neurelo-sdk && npm init --init-author-name='neurelo' --init-author-url='https://neurelo.com' --init-version='0.0.1' --yes && npm i --save axios@1.6.2 && cd ./../../
scripts.pkg:only: cd ./src/neurelo-sdk && npm pack --pack-destination='./../../' && cd ./../.. && npm i ./neurelo-sdk-0.0.1.tgz && rm -r ./src/neurelo-sdk
